languages.text: {n}Маражай раздраженно шипит и запечатывает контейнер. У вас появляется ощущение, что он злится не на пропажу, а на вас, словно вы не сделали что-то, что ксенос молчаливо от вас ожидал.{/n} "Нет. Здесь тоже пусто. Что ж..."

{n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай раздраженно шипит и запечатывает контейнер. У вас появляется ощущение, что он злится не на пропажу, а на вас, словно вы не сделали что-то, что ксенос молчаливо от вас ожидал.{/n} "Нет. Здесь тоже пусто. Что ж..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

{n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

{n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

{n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋恼怒地嘶了一声，封好了容器。你感觉到，他并不是因为损失了财产而愤怒，而是因为你而愤怒，因为你没有允许他做你本该默许的事情。{/n}“没有，这个地方也是空的，嗯……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋恼怒地嘶了一声，封好了容器。你感觉到，他并不是因为损失了财产而愤怒，而是因为你而愤怒，因为你没有允许他做你本该默许的事情。{/n}“不，不在这里。只剩一个地方没找过了……快来，这是我夺回失物的最后机会。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは苛立ちながらシューと声を出して、コンテナを密閉した。自分の大事なモノがなくて怒っているのではなく、こちらの態度が予想外だったせいで怒っているのだろう。{/n}「いいや、ここは空っぽすぎる。う～ん…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは苛立ちながらシューと声を出して、コンテナを密閉した。自分の大事なモノがなくて怒っているのではなく、こちらの態度が予想外だったせいで怒っているのだろう。{/n}「いいや、ここにはない。もう一か所ある…来い。これが取り戻す最後のチャンスだ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai resopla irritado y cierra el contenedor. Adviertes que no está furioso por haber perdido sus cosas, sino contigo por no hacer lo que tan claramente esperaba de ti.{/n} «No. Aquí tampoco está. Mmm...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai resopla irritado y cierra el contenedor. Adviertes que no está furioso por haber perdido sus cosas, sino contigo por no hacer lo que tan claramente esperaba de ti.{/n} «No. Aquí no está. Hay otro sitio... Vamos. Es mi última oportunidad de recuperar lo que busco».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pousse un sifflement rageur et referme le conteneur. Vous sentez que ce n'est pas la perte de ses affaires qui le contrarie. Il est en colère contre vous, pour n'avoir pas répondu à ses attentes implicites.{/n} « Non. Ici aussi, c'est vide. Hmm... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pousse un sifflement rageur et referme le conteneur. Vous sentez que ce n'est pas la perte de ses affaires qui le contrarie. Il est en colère contre vous, pour n'avoir pas répondu à ses attentes implicites.{/n} « Non. Il n'est pas ici. Il reste encore un endroit... En route, c'est ma dernière chance de récupérer ce qui m'appartient. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zischt vor Verärgerung und schließt den Container. Du spürst, dass er nicht wütend ist, weil er sein Eigentum verloren hat, sondern dir gegenüber, weil du nicht gemacht hast, was er stillschweigend von dir verlangt hat.{/n} "Nein. Hier ist auch nichts. Hmm ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zischt vor Verärgerung und schließt den Container. Du spürst, dass er nicht wütend ist, weil er sein Eigentum verloren hat, sondern dir gegenüber, weil du nicht gemacht hast, was er stillschweigend von dir verlangt hat.{/n} "Nein. Hier auch nicht. Es gibt noch einen Ort ... Kommt. Das ist die letzte Möglichkeit, ihn wiederzubekommen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kızkınlıkla tıslayarak konteyneri kapatıyor. Eşyalarını kaybettiği için değil, üstü kapalı olarak beklediği bir şeyi başaramadığın için sana öfkeli olduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n} "Hayır. Burası da boş. Hımm..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hisses in irritation and seals the container. You sense that he is not angry at the loss of his property, but at you, for failing to do something he tacitly expected you to do.{/n} "No. This place is empty too. Hmm..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, kızkınlıkla tıslayarak konteyneri kapatıyor. Eşyalarını kaybettiği için değil, üstü kapalı olarak beklediği bir şeyi başaramadığın için sana öfkeli olduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n} "Hayır. Burası da boş. Hımm..."
